item.title: Using Obscure CSS Notation For Dark Mode
item.description: I’ve written a more thorough take in react here, which I recommend over this, but this one’s too interesting to leave out. Fundamental Idea: use the CSS + selector to match sibling items with a checkbox label. Making The Toggle First, let’s set up the HTML file, a checkbox as our toggle. A wrapper division contains our label and subparts of the label. Every other piece of content will be a part of the wrapper.
